subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer was nearly upset before beating Feliciano López, 7-6 (13), 6-7 (1), 7-6 (7). Federer saved a match point in a three-hour victory at the Mutua Madrilena Masters in Madrid.
snippet: Roger Federer was nearly upset before beating Feliciano López, 7-6 (13), 6-7 (1), 7-6 (7). Federer saved a match point in a three-hour victory at the Mutua Madrilena Masters in Madrid.
